title: 131: Quarantined with Craig Conant (& Tips from Nurjahan Boulden)
itunes:title: 131: Quarantined with Craig Conant (& Tips from Nurjahan Boulden)
description:
The past few days have been really tough, Broads. Today we start the episode by talking to our previous guest Nurjahan Boulden about her experience with COVID-19 and ways to move in this world as it is happening (4:30 - 34:45). Then our #broadsquad favorite - stand up comic, Craig Conant, joins us to take a breath, laugh, have some fun, and answer some of your wild questions (40:00). Stay safe and healthy, Broads. We love you all.
CRAIG CONANT:
Follow Craig at: @craigpconant
Check out his podcast: @communityservicepod
And find out about his future stand up dates and merch: www.craigconant.com (http://www.craigconant.com/)
NURJAHAN BOULDEN:
Follow Nurjahan at: @nurjahanboulden
And find out more about her and her classes at: www.releaseanxietytoday.com (http://www.releaseanxietytoday.com/)
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
*** OPENFIT: Get a special extended 14-day free trial membership to OPENFIT when you text CHATTY to 505050
*** TALKSPACE: Use the code CHATTY to get $100 off your first month at talkspace.com (http://talkspace.com/)
*** ETTITUDE: Get 20% off your sheet set and FREE shipping by texting CHAT to 64-000
*** CANDID: Get started with $75 off by using code CHATTY at http://candidco.com/chatty
*** MAGIC SPOON: Go to to grab a variety pack by using promo code CHATTY at checkout to ​get free shipping!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
